name: ether
description: [![Travis (.org)](https://img.shields.io/travis/ether/etherpad-lite)](https://travis-ci.org/github/ether/etherpad-lite) ![Demo Etherpad Animated Jif](doc/images/etherpad_demo.gif "Etherpad in action")

scripts.deploy: cd deploy && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start: DB_TYPE=postgres DB_HOST=$PGHOST DB_PORT=$PGPORT DB_USER=$PGUSER DB_PASS=$PGPASSWORD DB_NAME=$PGDATABASE bash ./bin/run.sh --root
